title: Red Wine Jus
directions: STEP 1 Put enough oil in a pan to just coat the shallots, then caramelise them.
STEP 2 Add port, red wine and herbs, bring to boil. Simmer and reduce by half.
STEP 3 Add stock and reduce by half again, to a consistency that will coat a spoon.
STEP 4 Taste regularly and add a pinch of salt, if needed.
STEP 5 Remove pan from heat and strain jus through a fine sieve.
STEP 6 Return to stove and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and melt in butter.
